name: Shrek's Wonderland
description:
A hard-to-complete maze-labyrinth-tactical game, where your goal is to avoid Shrek, and reach the portal at the end of the level. Use the arrow keys, the letter 'c,' the enter key, and nothing else... to navigate your way through the dead ends, maze, and escape.

*This game has a lot of flashing images and loud noises... that means, it is entirely your fault if you play this game, and if you do not adhere to my warnings, and poop your pantsu. Uhhh...

UHHHHHHHHHHHH, I do not know if it will work for you, but if it does not run on your computer, then get a better computer or something, idk. Lol.

Made by Joe Capo, Alphawolf0 and Lil' Atlas.

Lol.
